closed_reason: Ported merge-file command to Cobra. Created cmd/tk/cmd/mergefile.go with ExactArgs(4) for base/ours/theirs/path positional args. Added tickFromPath and writeTickPath helpers. description: Migrate merge-file command to Cobra. Preserve merge conflict resolution behavior.
title: Port merge-file command to Cobra
